0.title: Do You Have An Account?
0.body: YourProjectName® allow you to create employees records, attach face images, and access reports

1.title: 100% Cloud
1.body: The first Face Recognition Attendance System that works 100% over the cloud, you don’t need to worry your data securely stored and backup.

2.title: No Installation
2.body:
No technician needs to visit your office. 
  You don’t need servers, special devices, or networking to use YourProjectName®

3.title: Unlimited Scalability
3.body: YourProjectName® fits small, medium, and large Enterprises. You can start with one user, one employee, and one device; eventually you can add more - unlimitted - number of resources as your business grows

4.title: Audit Log
4.body: Admin can easily track other users’ activities and know when they login or out, and what they have done

5.title: Multi Time Zones
5.body: YourProjectName® manages multi time zones attendance, so it supports companies having global branches and performs the time zones conversion.

6.title: IP and GEO Restrictions
6.body:
Restrict employees and devices from reporting face attendances using IP Address, 
  Location on Map, or both.

0.title: 1. Sign Up
0.body: Click the button to Sign Up and get a Free account.

1.title: 2. Login
1.body:
From a computer browser, open 
https://app.YourProjectName.com
 Login with your credentials to setup your account.

2.title: 3. Setup
2.body:
Go to Location/Device
 Click on Add Location button.
On devices column, add a new device to the location

3.title: 4. Authenticate App
3.body:
On Location/Device page
Choose the device and click on Authenticate To Show your QR code
 In your mobile app, click Link Device and scan QR code.

4.title: 5. Track Attendance
4.body: Use the authenticated mobile app to Check In/Out employees with their faces.
